title: Chilled fresh fruit salad
description: This is a refreshing fruit salad that can be made in advance and won’t oxidise and go brown. It makes a delicious dessert after a rich main meal.Each serving provides 110kcal, 2g protein, 20g carbohydrate (of which 20g sugars), 0g fat (of which 0g saturates), 7g fibre and 0g salt.
